short_description: A premium high-capacity power bank with fast charging and USB-C PD support.
features: Charges laptops, tablets, and phones. 45W USB-C PD output ideal for MacBooks. Durable build with travel-friendly design.

short_description: Slim wireless power bank that supports fast wireless and wired charging.
features: Supports Qi wireless charging for Samsung and other compatible devices. Simultaneous charging via USB ports.

short_description: Eco-friendly power bank with solar panel for outdoor and emergency use.
features: Built-in solar panel for recharging under sunlight. Ideal for camping and travel. Multiple output ports for convenience.

short_description: Affordable and compact power bank with dual USB output.
features: Sleek metal design with 18W fast charging. Excellent for daily backup charging. Compact and easy to carry.

short_description: Professional-grade power bank for laptops, tablets, and phones.
features: Up to 100W PD charging. OLED display for power status. Ideal for professionals on the move. Durable aluminum casing.
Tube-style design fits in your pocket. Great for emergencies and short trips. Charges one phone once fully.

short_description: Massive capacity power bank with multiple ports for family or group use.
features: Simultaneously charges up to 5 devices. LCD display shows charge level. Built-in safety protections.

short_description: Durable power bank designed for outdoor use in tough environments.
features: Shockproof, dustproof, and water-resistant. 60W PD output for fast laptop charging. Rubberized exterior for grip.

short_description: Slim and sleek power bank for everyday carry.
features: High efficiency lithium-polymer battery. Dual output for charging two devices. Lightweight and minimal profile.

short_description: Magnetic wireless battery pack designed for iPhones with MagSafe.
features: Snaps perfectly onto iPhone. Integrates with iOS battery widget. Charges automatically without a button press.
